main event: On July 27, 1949, a civilian in Louisville, Kentucky reported a spherical object with a reddish glow, comparable in size to a large star, traveling in a northeasterly direction for approximately 1 minute. The object stopped at short intervals and then continued in a zig-zag course before being concluded as a balloon.
interesting points: The object's shape was spherical with a reddish glow, and it was comparable in size to a large star.
It traveled in a northeasterly direction and stopped at short intervals before continuing in a zig-zag course.
The observation lasted for approximately 1 minute.
The conclusion of the observation was that the object was a balloon.
The report does not mention any physical evidence or photographs of the object.
sighted object: spherical object with a reddish glow
